title: [Large-Scale] Multiple Intelligence-Based Virtual Safety Lessons for Construction Sites

context.prior_knowledge: General Understanding of Construction Site Work Procedures and Basic Safety Protocols
context.additional_context: Mobile-based education in a BYOD environment, systematically raising safety risk awareness at construction sites for 30-something office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three types of fall accidents occurring at construction sites and describe preventive measures
Accurately perform safety work procedures at least 80% correctly by utilizing diverse interactive content based on multiple intelligences theory
Collaboratively propose and evaluate team-based risk response strategies through real-time collaborative activities in a virtual classroom environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
